name: Sonic's Reimagined Adventure
description: This is a fan-made remake of Emerald Coast from SA1. The level is fun to play through and is a mix of sonic adventure sonic and the sonic in the newer games. I recommend downloading the game and playing it with a gamepad/controller. Keyboard input works but isn't ideal. If you liked the game, comment FORCES IS BAD and follow if you want. The controller's left stick is inverted in the HTML version of the game but not in the windows version. I am not profiting from this game in any way.
